Table of Contents

Enum MPVFormat

Namespace
Nickvision.MPVSharp.Internal

Data format for options and properties.

public enum MPVFormat

Fields

ByteArray = 9

A raw byte[], only used with MPVNode.

Double = 5

The basic type is double.

Flag = 3

The basic type is int (0 or 1).

Int64 = 4

The basic type is long (int64_t in C).

Node = 6

The type is MPVNode.

NodeArray = 7

Used with MPVNode only.

NodeMap = 8

Used with MPVNode only.

None = 0

Invalid.

OSDString = 2

The basic type is string (char* in C). It returns the OSD property string, like using ${property} in input.conf

String = 1

The basic type is string (char* in C). It returns the raw property string, like using ${=property} in input.conf
